result.markdown:
--- title: "Learning to Love Regexes By Learning Them" subtitle: "I Promised Myself I Wouldn't Do This Again" description: "Building a regex generator for self-contained, well-defined string detection problems is a very effective way to learn regular expressions." format: html: reference-location: margin other-links: - text: Regex Cheatsheet icon: bookmark-plus href: https://github.com/raredd/regex - text: RexEgg icon: bookmark-plus href: https://www.rexegg.com/ - text: Regex in R icon: bookmark-plus href: https://stat.ethz.ch/R-manual/R-devel/library/base/html/regex.html editor_options: chunk_output_type: console --- ::: {.cell} ::: # HCPCS ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} `````{=html} 
                 Count                                   Regex
All              18903 (^[A-CEGHJ-MP-V0-9][0-9]{3}[AFMTU0-9]$)
 Level I         10985                  (^[0-9]{4}[AFMTU0-9]$)
  Category I      9990                    (^[0-9]{4}[AMU0-9]$)
  Category II      565                           (^[0-9]{4}F$)
  Category III     430                           (^[0-9]{4}T$)
 Level II         7918              (^[A-CEGHJ-MP-V][0-9]{4}$)
````` ::: # TODO * ~~If a **wildcard** begins with a **letter**, the *postfix* should be `[0-9]{n}`.~~ * Eliminate `g1()` step in grouping. * In `remove_redundant()`, try pmap for `rr()` step. ## Checklist - [X] `split_lengths()` - [X] `remove_redundant()` - [ ] `process_groups()` - [X] `g1()` - [X] `g2()` - [ ] `g3()` - [ ] `g4()` - [ ] `g5()` - [ ] `reduce_groups()` # Helpers ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} random_hcpcs_vec2 <- \(n = 10) { ltrs <- LETTERS[sf$grepl(LETTERS, "[^DINOW-Z]")] c( sample(c(ltrs, 0:9), size = sample.int(5, 1)), codex::random_hcpcs(n = n, l = 2), codex::random_hcpcs(n = n, l = 3), codex::random_hcpcs(n = n, l = 4), codex::random_hcpcs(n = n, l = 5) ) } ``` ::: ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} sort_order <- \(x) { sort <- stringr::str_sort(x, numeric = TRUE) alph <- stringr::str_extract_all(sort, stringr::regex("[A-Z]")) numb <- stringr::str_extract_all(sort, stringr::regex("[0-9]")) alph <- purrr::list_c(alph) numb <- purrr::list_c(numb) paste0( paste0(alph, collapse = ""), paste0(numb, collapse = "") ) } ``` ::: ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} unique_vlength <- \(x) collapse::funique(collapse::vlengths(x, use.names = FALSE)) unique_narm <- \(x) collapse::funique(collapse::na_rm(x)) max_vlength <- \(x) collapse::fmax(collapse::vlengths(x, use.names = FALSE)) empty <- \(x) vctrs::vec_is_empty(x) take_at <- \(x, i = 1) stringfish::sf_substr(x, start = i, stop = i, nthreads = 4L) chop <- \(v, g) vctrs::vec_chop(v, sizes = vctrs::vec_run_sizes(g)) detect_az <- \(x) x[sf$grepl(x, "[A-Z]{1}")] ``` ::: ## View ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} cutoff <- \(x) stringr::str_trunc(string = x, width = 40, side = "right") wrap <- \(x) stringr::str_wrap(string = x, width = 60, exdent = 5, whitespace_only = FALSE) view <- \(x) { idx <- seq_along(x) len <- collapse::vlengths(x, use.names = FALSE) tree <- unname(purrr::map_vec(x, paste0, collapse = " ")) |> purrr::map_vec(cutoff) cat( glue::glue( "{format(idx)}: ", "{format(len)}|", "--[{if (empty(tree)) NULL else format(tree, justify = 'none')}]" ), sep = "\n") } view_remove <- \(x) { len <- length(x) tree <- unname(paste0(x, collapse = " ")) |> purrr::map_vec(cutoff) cat( glue::glue( "Removed ", "{format(len, justify = 'left')}|", "--[{if (empty(tree)) NULL else format(tree, justify = 'none')}]" ), sep = "\n") } ``` ::: # Preprocessing ## `split_lengths()` ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} split_lengths <- function(x, verbose = TRUE) { stopifnot(is.character(x)) x <- stringfish::sf_gsub(x, "\\*|\\s", "", nthreads = 4L) |> unique_narm() |> stringr::str_sort() l <- collapse::vlengths(x) out <- list( x1 = x[l == 1], x2 = x[l == 2], x3 = x[l == 3], x4 = x[l == 4], x5 = x[l == 5]) if (verbose) { cat("* Split By Lengths:", sep = "\n") cat(view(out), sep = "\n") return(invisible(out)) } else { return(out) } } random_hcpcs_vec2(n = 5) |> split_lengths() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ``` Error in random_hcpcs_vec2(n = 5): object 'sf' not found ``` ::: ::: ## `remove_redundant()` If a vector contains both `"A"` and `"A0"`, remove `"A0"`. Codes that contain a common sub-string can be simplified, in turn simplifying the eventual regex output. ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} contrast <- \(long, short) { if (empty(long)) return(character(0)) if (empty(short)) return(long) end <- unique_vlength(short) ldx <- stringfish::sf_substr(long, 1, end, nthreads = 4L) long[!ldx %in% short] } rr <- contrast ``` ::: ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} remove_redundant <- function(x, verbose = TRUE) { .c(x1, x2, x3, x4, x5) %=% x out <- list( x1 = x1, x2 = rr(x2, x1), x3 = rr(x3, x1) |> rr(x2), x4 = rr(x4, x1) |> rr(x2) |> rr(x3), x5 = rr(x5, x1) |> rr(x2) |> rr(x3) |> rr(x4) ) if (verbose) { cat("* Remove Redundancies:", sep = "\n") cat(view(out), sep = "\n") return(invisible(out)) } else { return(out) } } random_hcpcs_vec2(25) |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ``` Error in random_hcpcs_vec2(25): object 'sf' not found ``` ::: ::: # Grouping Group each set of vectors into regex patterns. ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} lump <- function(x, threshold = 3) { stopifnot(is.numeric(x)) xo <- order(x) xs <- x[xo] dlag <- abs(c(0, xs[-1] - xs[seq_along(xs) - 1])) bi <- ifelse(dlag >= threshold, 1, 0) id <- cumsum(bi) + 1 id[xo] } ``` ::: ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} letters_2_numbers <- \(x) { look <- rlang::set_names( seq_along(LETTERS), LETTERS) unname(look[detect_az(x)]) } ``` ::: ::: {.panel-tabset} ## [g1|g2] ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} g1 <- function(x, verbose = TRUE) { x <- collapse::get_elem(x, "x1") if (empty(x)) return(character(0)) out <- list(x) if (verbose) { cat("** Group 1:", sep = "\n") cat(view(out), sep = "\n") return(invisible(out)) } else { return(out) } } g2 <- function(x, verbose = TRUE) { x <- collapse::get_elem(x, "x2") if (empty(x)) return(character(0)) out <- collapse::rsplit(x, take_at(x, 1), use.names = FALSE) if (verbose) { cat("** Group 2:", sep = "\n") cat(view(out), sep = "\n") return(invisible(out)) } else { return(out) } } random_hcpcs_vec2() |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> g1() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ``` Error in random_hcpcs_vec2(): object 'sf' not found ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} random_hcpcs_vec2(25) |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> g2() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ``` Error in random_hcpcs_vec2(25): object 'sf' not found ``` ::: ::: ## [g3] ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} g3 <- function(x, verbose = TRUE) { x <- collapse::get_elem(x, "x3") if (empty(x)) return(character(0)) chr <- detect_az(x) num <- x[!x %in% chr] num <- data.table( code = num, lump = lump(as.integer(num))) chr <- data.table::data.table( code = chr, lump = lump(as.integer(stringr::str_replace_all(chr, "[A-Z]", letters_2_numbers)))) out <- vec_c( if (empty(num)) NULL else chop(num$code, num$lump), if (empty(chr)) NULL else chop(chr$code, chr$lump)) if (empty(out)) return(character(0)) if (verbose) { cat("** Group 3:", sep = "\n") cat(view(out), sep = "\n") return(invisible(out)) } else { return(out) } } all_tests[nchar(all_tests) < 3] |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> g3() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` * Split By Lengths: 1: 6|--[0 4 5 6 G J] 2: 29|--[02 03 04 05 15 20 22 27 30 31 32 34 3...] 3: 0|--[] 4: 0|--[] 5: 0|--[] * Remove Redundancies: 1: 6|--[0 4 5 6 G J] 2: 17|--[15 20 22 27 30 31 32 34 35 36 76 92 9...] 3: 0|--[] 4: 0|--[] 5: 0|--[] ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` character(0) ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} all_tests[nchar(all_tests) == 3] |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> g3() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` * Split By Lengths: 1: 0|--[] 2: 0|--[] 3: 55|--[021 022 026 027 032 033 042 044 050 1...] 4: 0|--[] 5: 0|--[] * Remove Redundancies: 1: 0|--[] 2: 0|--[] 3: 55|--[021 022 026 027 032 033 042 044 050 1...] 4: 0|--[] 5: 0|--[] ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ``` Error in detect_az(x): object 'sf' not found ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} random_hcpcs_vec2(30) |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> g3() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ``` Error in random_hcpcs_vec2(30): object 'sf' not found ``` ::: ::: ## [4] ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} g4 <- function(x, verbose = TRUE) { x <- collapse::get_elem(x, "x4") if (empty(x)) return(character(0)) chr <- detect_az(x) num <- x[!x %in% chr] num <- data.table::data.table(code = num, lump = lump(as.integer(num))) chr <- data.table::data.table( code = chr, lump = lump( as.integer( stringr::str_replace_all(chr, "[A-Z]", letters_2_numbers) ))) out <- vctrs::vec_c( if (empty(num)) NULL else chop(num$code, num$lump), if (empty(chr)) NULL else chop(chr$code, chr$lump)) if (empty(out)) return(character(0)) if (verbose) { cat("** Group 4:", sep = "\n") cat(view(out), sep = "\n") return(invisible(out)) } else { return(out) } } hcpcs_tests[20:25] |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> g4() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` * Split By Lengths: 1: 0|--[] 2: 0|--[] 3: 0|--[] 4: 6|--[5203 5204 5205 5206 5207 5208] 5: 0|--[] * Remove Redundancies: 1: 0|--[] 2: 0|--[] 3: 0|--[] 4: 6|--[5203 5204 5205 5206 5207 5208] 5: 0|--[] ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ``` Error in detect_az(x): object 'sf' not found ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} long_test2 |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> g4() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` * Split By Lengths: 1: 12|--[0 1 2 3 5 6 7 9 C E G S] 2: 29|--[02 03 04 05 15 20 22 27 30 31 32 34 3...] 3: 46|--[021 022 026 027 032 033 042 044 050 1...] 4: 74|--[0214 0215 0217 0218 0219 0220 0221 02...] 5: 116|--[0214T 0215T 0217T 0218T 0219T 0220T 0...] * Remove Redundancies: 1: 12|--[0 1 2 3 5 6 7 9 C E G S] 2: 0|--[] 3: 0|--[] 4: 0|--[] 5: 0|--[] ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` character(0) ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} random_hcpcs_vec2() |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> g4() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ``` Error in random_hcpcs_vec2(): object 'sf' not found ``` ::: ::: ## [5] ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} g5 <- function(x, verbose = TRUE) { x <- collapse::get_elem(x, "x5") if (empty(x)) return(character(0)) chr <- detect_az(x) num <- x[!x %in% chr] num <- data.table::data.table(code = num, lump = lump(as.integer(num))) chr <- data.table::data.table( code = chr, lump = lump( as.integer( stringr::str_remove_all(chr, "[A-Z]") ))) out <- vctrs::vec_c( if (empty(num)) NULL else chop(num$code, num$lump), if (empty(chr)) NULL else chop(chr$code, chr$lump)) if (empty(out)) return(character(0)) if (verbose) { cat("** Group 5:", sep = "\n") cat(view(out), sep = "\n") return(invisible(out)) } else { return(out) } } hcpcs_tests[26:30] |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> g5() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` * Split By Lengths: 1: 0|--[] 2: 0|--[] 3: 0|--[] 4: 0|--[] 5: 5|--[92015 92016 92017 92018 92019] * Remove Redundancies: 1: 0|--[] 2: 0|--[] 3: 0|--[] 4: 0|--[] 5: 5|--[92015 92016 92017 92018 92019] ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ``` Error in detect_az(x): object 'sf' not found ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} long_test2 |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> g5() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` * Split By Lengths: 1: 12|--[0 1 2 3 5 6 7 9 C E G S] 2: 29|--[02 03 04 05 15 20 22 27 30 31 32 34 3...] 3: 46|--[021 022 026 027 032 033 042 044 050 1...] 4: 74|--[0214 0215 0217 0218 0219 0220 0221 02...] 5: 116|--[0214T 0215T 0217T 0218T 0219T 0220T 0...] * Remove Redundancies: 1: 12|--[0 1 2 3 5 6 7 9 C E G S] 2: 0|--[] 3: 0|--[] 4: 0|--[] 5: 0|--[] ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` character(0) ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} new_test |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> g5() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` * Split By Lengths: 1: 0|--[] 2: 0|--[] 3: 0|--[] 4: 0|--[] 5: 91|--[90460 90461 90471 90474 90619 90633 9...] * Remove Redundancies: 1: 0|--[] 2: 0|--[] 3: 0|--[] 4: 0|--[] 5: 91|--[90460 90461 90471 90474 90619 90633 9...] ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ``` Error in detect_az(x): object 'sf' not found ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} random_hcpcs_vec2() |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> g5() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ``` Error in random_hcpcs_vec2(): object 'sf' not found ``` ::: ::: ::: # Process Groups ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} process_groups <- function(x, verbose = TRUE) { out <- list( g1 = g1(x, verbose = verbose), g2 = g2(x, verbose = verbose), g3 = g3(x, verbose = verbose), g4 = g4(x, verbose = verbose), g5 = g5(x, verbose = verbose) ) if (verbose) { return(invisible(out)) } else { return(out) } } hcpcs_tests |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> process_groups() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` * Split By Lengths: 1: 6|--[0 4 5 6 G J] 2: 3|--[30 31 32] 3: 9|--[721 722 723 724 725 726 727 728 729] 4: 7|--[5202 5203 5204 5205 5206 5207 5208] 5: 5|--[92015 92016 92017 92018 92019] * Remove Redundancies: 1: 6|--[0 4 5 6 G J] 2: 3|--[30 31 32] 3: 9|--[721 722 723 724 725 726 727 728 729] 4: 0|--[] 5: 5|--[92015 92016 92017 92018 92019] ** Group 1: 1: 6|--[0 4 5 6 G J] ** Group 2: 1: 3|--[30 31 32] ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ``` Error in detect_az(x): object 'sf' not found ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} long_test2 |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> process_groups() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` * Split By Lengths: 1: 12|--[0 1 2 3 5 6 7 9 C E G S] 2: 29|--[02 03 04 05 15 20 22 27 30 31 32 34 3...] 3: 46|--[021 022 026 027 032 033 042 044 050 1...] 4: 74|--[0214 0215 0217 0218 0219 0220 0221 02...] 5: 116|--[0214T 0215T 0217T 0218T 0219T 0220T 0...] * Remove Redundancies: 1: 12|--[0 1 2 3 5 6 7 9 C E G S] 2: 0|--[] 3: 0|--[] 4: 0|--[] 5: 0|--[] ** Group 1: 1: 12|--[0 1 2 3 5 6 7 9 C E G S] ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} all_tests |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> process_groups() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` * Split By Lengths: 1: 6|--[0 4 5 6 G J] 2: 29|--[02 03 04 05 15 20 22 27 30 31 32 34 3...] 3: 55|--[021 022 026 027 032 033 042 044 050 1...] 4: 81|--[0214 0215 0217 0218 0219 0220 0221 02...] 5: 121|--[0214T 0215T 0217T 0218T 0219T 0220T 0...] * Remove Redundancies: 1: 6|--[0 4 5 6 G J] 2: 17|--[15 20 22 27 30 31 32 34 35 36 76 92 9...] 3: 9|--[721 722 723 724 725 726 727 728 729] 4: 0|--[] 5: 0|--[] ** Group 1: 1: 6|--[0 4 5 6 G J] ** Group 2: 1: 1|--[15] 2: 3|--[20 22 27] 3: 6|--[30 31 32 34 35 36] 4: 1|--[76] 5: 2|--[92 95] 6: 2|--[C7 C9] 7: 1|--[E0] 8: 1|--[S2] ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ``` Error in detect_az(x): object 'sf' not found ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} random_hcpcs_vec2() |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> process_groups() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ``` Error in random_hcpcs_vec2(): object 'sf' not found ``` ::: ::: ## Reduce Runs ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} reduce_runs <- function(x) { ad <- c(LETTERS, 0:9) # if (x == paste0(ad, collapse = "")) return("[A-Z0-9]") vec <- rlang::set_names(rep(0, 36), ad) vec2 <- vec[fuimus::splitter(x)] vec2 <- vec2[!is.na(vec2)] vec[names(vec2)] <- 1 vec_group <- dplyr::tibble( value = names(vec), key = vec, idx = seq_along(vec), group = dplyr::consecutive_id(key)) |> dplyr::mutate(group_size = dplyr::n(), .by = group) |> dplyr::filter(key == 1, group_size >= 3) |> dplyr::select(value, group) if (empty(vec_group)) return(x) xgroups <- chop(vec_group$value, vec_group$group) |> purrr::map(fuimus::collapser) |> purrr::list_c() replacements <- dplyr::left_join( dplyr::slice_min(vec_group, by = group, order_by = value) |> dplyr::rename(start = value), dplyr::slice_max(vec_group, by = group, order_by = value) |> dplyr::rename(end = value), by = dplyr::join_by(group)) |> glue::glue_data("{start}-{end}") |> as.vector() res <- stringi::stri_replace_all_regex(x, xgroups, replacements, vectorize_all = FALSE) paste0("[", res, "]") } ``` ::: ## G == 1 ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} p1 <- function(x) { if (empty(x[["g1"]])) return(character(0)) g1 <- collapse::get_elem(x, "g1")[[1]] re <- sort_order(g1) |> reduce_runs() if (re == "[A-Z0-9]") return(paste0("^", re, "{5}$")) postfix <- ifelse( stringfish::sf_grepl(re, "^\\[?[A-Z]\\-?", nthreads = 4L), "[0-9]", "[A-Z0-9]") glue::glue("^{re}{postfix}{{4}}$") } hcpcs_tests |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> process_groups() |> p1() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` * Split By Lengths: 1: 6|--[0 4 5 6 G J] 2: 3|--[30 31 32] 3: 9|--[721 722 723 724 725 726 727 728 729] 4: 7|--[5202 5203 5204 5205 5206 5207 5208] 5: 5|--[92015 92016 92017 92018 92019] * Remove Redundancies: 1: 6|--[0 4 5 6 G J] 2: 3|--[30 31 32] 3: 9|--[721 722 723 724 725 726 727 728 729] 4: 0|--[] 5: 5|--[92015 92016 92017 92018 92019] ** Group 1: 1: 6|--[0 4 5 6 G J] ** Group 2: 1: 3|--[30 31 32] ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-error} ``` Error in detect_az(x): object 'sf' not found ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} long_test2 |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> process_groups() |> p1() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` * Split By Lengths: 1: 12|--[0 1 2 3 5 6 7 9 C E G S] 2: 29|--[02 03 04 05 15 20 22 27 30 31 32 34 3...] 3: 46|--[021 022 026 027 032 033 042 044 050 1...] 4: 74|--[0214 0215 0217 0218 0219 0220 0221 02...] 5: 116|--[0214T 0215T 0217T 0218T 0219T 0220T 0...] * Remove Redundancies: 1: 12|--[0 1 2 3 5 6 7 9 C E G S] 2: 0|--[] 3: 0|--[] 4: 0|--[] 5: 0|--[] ** Group 1: 1: 12|--[0 1 2 3 5 6 7 9 C E G S] ``` ::: ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` ^[CEGS0-35-79][0-9]{4}$ ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} list(g1 = c(0:9, LETTERS)) |> p1() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` ^0[A-Z0-9]{4}$ ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} list(g1 = c(LETTERS[1:5], 0:9)) |> p1() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` ^A[0-9]{4}$ ``` ::: ::: ## G > 1 ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} p2 <- function(x) { if (empty(x)) return(character(0)) vec <- stringr::str_split_fixed(x, "", max_vlength(x)) |> as.data.frame() |> purrr::map(unique_narm) |> purrr::map(sort_order) |> purrr::map(reduce_runs) multi <- unname(nchar(vec) > 1) nobrack <- stringr::str_detect(vec[multi], "\\[|\\]", TRUE) vec[multi] <- ifelse(any(nobrack), purrr::map_chr(vec[multi], \(x) paste0("[", x, "]")), vec[multi]) paste0(purrr::list_c(vec), collapse = "") } ``` ::: # Reduce Groups ::: {.cell layout-align="center"} ```{.r .cell-code} vec_to_regex <- function(x, n) { if (empty(x)) return(character(0)) postfix <- ifelse( stringfish::sf_grepl( x, "^\\[?[A-Z]\\-?", nthreads = 4L), "[0-9]", "[A-Z0-9]") x <- data.table::fcase( n == 0, paste0("^", x, "$"), n == 1, paste0("^", x, postfix, "$"), default = paste0("^", x, postfix, "{", n, "}$")) paste0(x , collapse = "") } vrg <- vec_to_regex reduce_groups <- function(x) { list( g1 = p1(x), g2 = purrr::map_chr(x$g2, p2) |> purrr::map_chr(vrg, n = 3), g3 = purrr::map_chr(x$g3, p2) |> purrr::map_chr(vrg, n = 2), g4 = purrr::map_chr(x$g4, p2) |> purrr::map_chr(vrg, n = 1), g5 = purrr::map_chr(x$g5, p2) |> purrr::map_chr(vrg, n = 0) ) } all_tests[nchar(all_tests) > 2] |> split_lengths() |> remove_redundant() |> process_groups() |> reduce_groups() ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` * Split By Lengths: 1: 0|--[] 2: 0|--[] 3: 55|--[021 022 026 027 032 033 042
